ygData.subject: Re: Enchanting items
ygData.msgSnippet: It would be good if we could do that as the only magic class i know that can make magic wepons are the magi with there summon spells... would be good to make a
ygData.messageBody:
It would be good if we could do that as the only magic class i know that can
make magic wepons are the magi with there summon spells... would be good to
make a temp makec snake fang :)


----- Original Message -----
From: Brad Leon <Brad.Leon@...>
To: <eqenchanters@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, 20 July 1999 10:56:PM
Subject: [eqenchanters] Enchanting items


> From: Brad Leon <Brad.Leon@...>
>
> As far as enchanting items, we won't know until we see it. They had some
> Enchantment of brilliance spells which were supposed to make the item give
> off light. I'd like to see a level 8 or level 12 spell which temporarily
> makes a weapon able to hit magical creatures. We have a damage shield
spell
> (Feedback) so I doubt if that would be an enchantment (unless it was lower
> level). Any old school D&D players remember the spell "Permanence"? Make
> that a level 44 or 49 spell so our temporary weapon enchantments would
last
> forever. It would be neat to make a sword flame temporarily and give
extra
> damage. I wonder if we'd have to hold the weapon as we cast the spell.
All
> we know now is that it will be done, but I honestly have no clue what will
> actually be implemented.
>
> -Krye
>
> --------------------------- ONElist Sponsor ----------------------------
>
> ONElist: your connection to people who share your interests.
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
>
